block.p: LEAD: Lisa H. Steiman, the daughter of Esther Steiman of Black Rock, Conn., and the late Wolf Steiman, was married last evening to John B. Alters, the son of Maxine Alters and Gerald Alters, both of New York. Rabbi Robert J. Orkand officiated at Waveny House in New Haven. Mrs. Alters, 29, who graduated from New York University, is a producer of television commercials at BBDO advertising in New York.

LEAD: Lisa H. Steiman, the daughter of Esther Steiman of Black Rock, Conn., and the late Wolf Steiman, was married last evening to John B. Alters, the son of Maxine Alters and Gerald Alters, both of New York. Rabbi Robert J. Orkand officiated at Waveny House in New Haven. Mrs. Alters, 29, who graduated from New York University, is a producer of television commercials at BBDO advertising in New York.

Lisa H. Steiman, the daughter of Esther Steiman of Black Rock, Conn., and the late Wolf Steiman, was married last evening to John B. Alters, the son of Maxine Alters and Gerald Alters, both of New York. Rabbi Robert J. Orkand officiated at Waveny House in New Haven. Mrs. Alters, 29, who graduated from New York University, is a producer of television commercials at BBDO advertising in New York. Her husband, 30, who is a graduate of Syracuse University, is a music producer at McCann-Erickson in New York.
